question: You recently went to a concert and thought one of te singers was very good. You want to tell him hoe you feel.Write a letter to the singer. In your letter- say how you feel about his performance-give details of your musical activities-explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: This letter is to express my interest in the live concert you sang at the Mild tower on the 22 of May I enjoyed your performance during the concert.
I am one of your fans and proud of you for your talent.Moreover,on that exciting day,I was energized by your concert when you sang traditional music.So, this day will remain in my mind forever.

As far as I remember,I have been playing the piano.I also play the piano when I party with my friends.In addition,I recently enrolled in the guitar course owing to my father saying to me"I have a talent in the instrument".

If it would be possible,introduce me to the best institute,to help those who want to have a bright future.Besides these,if one day,your band needs an intern,I will be happy to let me know via the email I will write in the letter.
I look forward to receiving your response
